2010.context: Zebra Technologies Corporation is a enterprise asset tracking company focused on barcode printers, RFID, mobile computers, and software. Barcode printer and supplies leader.

2020.context: Zebra Technologies Corporation is a enterprise asset tracking company focused on barcode printers, RFID, mobile computers, and software. COVID supply chain drove demand.

competitors.name: Honeywell International
competitors.notes: Next biggest competitor across all three markets (printers, barcodes, mobile computers); has low-double digit market share

competitors.name: Datalogic
competitors.notes: Significant competitor in automatic data capture and industrial automation

2024.context: Zebra Technologies Corporation is a enterprise asset tracking company focused on barcode printers, RFID, mobile computers, and software. AI-powered analytics. Automation solutions.

competitors.name: Honeywell International
competitors.notes: Major competitor offering similar range of products and services; known for innovation in mobile computing, scanning, and printing

competitors.name: Datalogic
competitors.notes: Specializes in automatic data capture and industrial automation; strong market presence in Europe with innovative product lineup

competitors.name: Sato Holdings
competitors.notes: Renowned for printing solutions, particularly in barcode and RFID technology

competitors.notes: Competitor in barcode printing and point-of-sale systems
